document_data.mainbody:
Caliph Mogan bin Ahmed was the ruler of Mahabba in the Pantheist League of interior Zakhara in the early 1360s DR. 
Mogan was assassinated by Balanite heretics during a failed rebellion in 1360 DR. The League Conclave appointed Mamum al-Sahnan to impose martial law in Mahabba and crush the rebellion. Mamum was later confirmed as caliph of the city.
